ARABIC: لَيُدْخِلَنَّهُم مُّدْخَلًا يَرْضَوْنَهُۥ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلِيمٌ حَلِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He will admit them by an entrance which is pleasing to them. Allah is All-Knowing, All-Forbearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God will surely lead them to a place with which they will be gratified. Verily God is all-knowing and forbearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He will surely admit them to a resort which will please them. Most certainly Allah is All-Knowing, Most Forbearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God will certainly admit them to a pleasant dwelling. God is All-knowing and Forbearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He will certainly admit them to a place they will love; and indeed Allah is All Knowing, Most Forbearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Truly, He will make them enter an entrance with which they shall be well-pleased, and verily, Allah indeed is All-Knowing, Most Forbearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He will certainly cause them to enter a place of entrance which they shall be well pleased with, and most surely Allah is Knowing, Forbearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He shall admit them by a gate that is well-pleasing to them; and surely God is All-knowing, All-clement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Assuredly He will cause them to enter by an entry that they will love. Lo! Allah verily is Knower, Indulgent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He will admit them to a place with which they shall be well-pleased. For God is all knowing and most forbearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Surely He will make them enter an entrance wherewith they will be well pleased and verily Allah is Knowing, Forbearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He will admit them into an abode they are pleased with. Indeed Allah is all-knowing, all-forbearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily He will admit them to a place with which they shall be well pleased: for Allah is All-Knowing, Most Forbearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Truly, He will make them enter an entrance with which they shall be well-pleased, and verily, Allah indeed is All-Knowing, Most Forbearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He will admit them by a gate that is pleasing to them, and surely, Allah is the Knower, the Clement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He will admit them an admittance that will please them. God is Knowing and Clement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He will surely cause them to enter an entrance with which they will be pleased, and indeed, Allah is Knowing and Forbearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [22:59] Assuredly He will admit them into a place (read mudkhalan or madkhalan, [respectively] signifying the means of entry, or the place [entered]) that is pleasing to them, and that is Paradise. And truly God is Knowing, of their intentions, Forbearing, in refraining from punishing them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Assuredly He will cause them to enter by an entry that they will love) for themselves; it is also said that this means: they will accept, i.e. Paradise. (Lo! Allah verily is knower) of their reward and honouring, (Indulgent) by deferring the punishment of those who killed them.
